response.original_title: The Do's and Don'ts of Getting Married
response.overview: True love calls for a wedding and Max and Emma and their friends are winding themselves up into a frenzy over the planning. Everybody has a different vision for the wedding, and no one can agree. Until Sassy diva boss and self-appointed wedding planner, Scarlet takes charge.
response.tagline: True love calls for a wedding
response.title: The Do's and Don'ts of Getting Married
